First let me say that that the people that work there are the nicest and friendliest we encountered in Barcelona.  We visited a couple of times during our stay.  My boyfriend likes Martini's and they made the best.  Also during one of the visits I left my new tablet there and did not realize it for a while.  I had to back track to remember where I left it.  I came back they had it for me. Good people. Now, lets talk about the food.  Great, great and I mean great Tapas.   Our last night we visited 8 tapas restaurants they had listed in a competion BCN, every restaurant offered their best tapas and a small beer for 2,50, it was so much fun!  You voted for your favorite Tapa.  I voted for La Bomba which is Palosanto's tapas.  My mouth waters when I think about it.
